careerLaunch.title: Career Launch
careerLaunch.description: Comprehensive assessment for young professionals entering the workforce.

culturalIntelligence.title: Cultural Intelligence (CAIR)
culturalIntelligence.description: Evaluates ability to work effectively in culturally diverse environments.

communication.title: Communication Styles
communication.description: Identifies communication patterns and personal style preferences.

emotionalIntelligence.title: Emotional Intelligence
emotionalIntelligence.description: Measures ability to understand and manage emotions effectively.

leadership.title: Authentic Leadership
leadership.description: Assesses authentic leadership potential and style.

stressResilience.title: Stress Resilience
stressResilience.description: Evaluates ability to handle stress and workplace resilience.

genZ.title: Gen Z Workplace
genZ.description: Specialized assessment for understanding Generation Z workplace preferences.

digitalWellness.title: Digital Wellness
digitalWellness.description: Assesses digital habits and work-life balance in the digital age.

faithValues.title: Faith & Values
faithValues.description: Explores alignment between personal values and faith in professional context.

about.title: About AuthenCore Analytics
about.subtitle: Pioneers in modern psychometric assessment
about.missionText: To revolutionize talent assessment through advanced psychometric science and artificial intelligence.
